deleted.label: Task deleted
deleted.title: Task was deleted, report download could not be available.

notFound.label: No renderer
notFound.title: No renderer is available for given report

report-create.success: Report [{{record}}] will be created asynchronously. Report can be downloaded from reports agenda.

generic-entity-report.label: Report
generic-entity-report.title: Report selected objects to xls spreadsheet

changes-on-system-report.label: Compare values in IdM with values in system
changes-on-system-report.help: Report for comparison values in IdM and system (provisioning demo process).

mappingattributes.label: Mapping attributes
mappingattributes.help: Selected mapping attributes. Selection is limited by previous system and mapping select.

skipunchangedvalues.label: Skip unchanged values
skipunchangedvalues.help: If checked all unchanged values of a multivalued attribute are omitted from the report.

identities.label: Users
identities.help: Only the accounts of selected users will be included into the report.

treenode.label: $t(entity.TreeNode._type)
treenode.help: Only the accounts of users which belong to the selected organization unit will be included into the report.

rpt-report-by-report-type-evaluator.help: Gives access to only one report specified by code

report-type.label: Report code
report-type.help: Executor code, e. g., 'identity-report'. To allow downloading every generated report of this type, a Create or Administration permission is needed alongside Read! The field is single-valued, i. e., only one report can be here.

rpt-self-report-evaluator.help: Permissions for reports created by the currently logged user.

REPORT_GENERATE_SUCCESS.title: Report is completed
REPORT_GENERATE_SUCCESS.message: Report [{{reportName}}] was successfully completed. Report is available in report agenda.

REPORT_GENERATE_FAILED.title: Report failed
REPORT_GENERATE_FAILED.message: Report [{{reportName}}] generation failed. Failure reason is available in report agenda.

REPORT_WRONG_DEFINITION.title: Report failed
REPORT_WRONG_DEFINITION.message: Report type [{{firstType}}] is wrong. Should be [{{secondType}}].

REPORT_NO_FORM_ATTRIBUTE.title: Report failed
REPORT_NO_FORM_ATTRIBUTE.message: No form attribute with name [{{code}}] found!
